name: PHONG NHA CAVE AND PARADISE CAVE GROUP TOUR
description:
Phong Nha cave andParadise caveare the two most famous
caves in Phong Nha – Ke Bang National Park, which was listed in UNESCO’s
World Heritage Sites in 2003 for its geological values. With a length of 7,729
m,Phong Nha caveis considered
as one of the world’s longest wet cave, while Paradise is the longest
dry cave (31 km). Join Phong Nha and Paradise cave
tourfrom Dong Hoi to explore the most magnificent and brilliant
caves. Join us, we make sure that you will have unforgettable
memories and experiences.
